overview:
Wayne Harrel is the founder of Zielix®, Igniter Inc, Tech angel investor and creator of App Ingenium. Wayne started to work as a consultant in tech marketing area after he came to the valley.

Wayne is also a part time angel investor and working on a bunch of apps and web services for businesses and individuals. Wayne moved to San Francisco to attract VCs, but ended up investing from his own personal savings in his startup. Wayne started Zielix® as a small project but ended up creating it as a base brand for most of his products.

Wayne is working on what he says a breakthrough gaming engine for iOS platform to use it as a base of his upcoming mobile games.
